content: continuing around the right leg r1 continued single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 6 stitches single_crochet in next 10 stitches 5 of these will be the other side of the chain made and 5 around the left leg single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 6 stitches single_crochet in the next 20 stitches this should bring you to the back of the monster making colour changes further up less noticeable r2 *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 5 stitches* repeat around 42 r3-r4 single_crochet around 42 r5 *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 6 stitches * repeat around 48 r6-r7 single_crochet around 48 r8 - *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 7 stitches * repeat around 54 r9-r10 single_crochet around 54 r11 - *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 8 stitches * repeat around 60 r12 single_crochet around 60 r13-r15 single_crochet around in yarn b 60 r16 single_crochet around in yarn c 60 r17 single_crochet around in yarn a 60 r18 single_crochet around in yarn c 60 r19 -r21 single_crochet around in yarn b 60 property of netty-knitz r22-r25 single_crochet around in yarn a 60 r26 - single_crochet the next 34 stitches chain 10 skip 10 stitches single_crochet in next 16 stitches this has made the mouth opening 60 i used stitch markers to show the skip 10 stitches r27 *decrease single_crochet in next 8 stitches* repeat around 54 r28 single_crochet around 54 r29 - *decrease single_crochet in next 7 stitches * repeat around 48 r30 we attach the arms on this row single_crochet in next 16 stitches attach arm 1 here you single_crochet through the arm as well as the body see photo single_crochet in next 17 stitches attach arm 2 r31 - *decrease single_crochet in the next 6 stitches * repeat around 42 r32 single_crochet around 42 r33 - *decrease single_crochet in the next 5 stitches * repeat around 36 r34 single_crochet around attach mouth 36 property of netty-knitz place the mouth inside the chain space gap made earlier single_crochet around from the outside to attach the mouth and make the lip effect fasten_off and sew ends begin to firmly stuff the monster as you will be decreasing next r35 - *decrease single_crochet in the next 4 stitches * repeat around 30 r36 - *decrease single_crochet in the next 3 stitches * repeat around 24 r37 - *decrease single_crochet in the next 2 stitches * repeat around 18 r30 - *decrease single_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around 12 r39 - r43 - single_crochet around fasten_off arms make two r1 magic_ring 8 single_crochet 8 r2 single_crochet increase each stitch 16 r3 single_crochet around 16 r4 - r5 change yarn to colour b single_crochet around 16 r6 change yarn to colour a *decrease single_crochet in next 2 stitches * repeat around 12 r7 r21 single_crochet around fasten_off stuff arms mouth r1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet chain 1 6 r2 single_crochet increase each stitch join chain 1 12 r3 - *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next stitch* repeat around join ch1 18 r4
